attr.title: Boneraiser Minions
attr.desc:
Amass an army of undead to fight endless waves of heroes intent to end your boneraising ways! In this gothic auto-battler rogue-lite Survivor-like, use the bones of slain heroes to raise your minions, collect relics and spells, and unlock meta upgrades, all to survive King Gigald's crusade! 
This works with v37.9
attr.inst: Purchase the game from steam. Download the game via steam depot and transfer all the game files to ports/boneraiserminions/assets.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game from [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1944570/Boneraiser_Minions/). Open steam console via Windows+R: Type: steam://open/console, download version 37.9 by typing: `download_depot 1944570 1944571 1079624835738126360` in the console. When the download is complete, it will tell you the location of the folder. Transfer all the game files to ports/boneraiserminions/assets.
